=Configuration= 
Shows a window that allows you to change some parameters of use of the application. 
 * VDP - Change the color palette on computers that have a V9938 VDP or higher. 
 * PSG - PSG uses the internal or incorporating the MegaFlashROM SCC +
 * Control - Change control device. 
 * OK {{{[Return]}}} - Apply the changes. 
 * Exit {{{[Esc]}}} - Returns without making changes.
